function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Observational and interventional studies assessed using different checklists, which may lead to inconsistent assessment and comparison of results.","Impact":"Potential for bias and misinterpretation of study findings.","Mitigation":"Standardize the assessment criteria for observational and interventional studies to ensure consistency in evaluation.","Technologies":"Standardized checklists or assessment tools for observational and interventional studies.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and public health professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health departments, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Meta-analysis based on 'high' and 'low' greenspace exposure defined by individual papers' highest and lowest categories, which may result in inconsistent categorization and interpretation of exposure levels.","Impact":"Risk of misclassification and misinterpretation of greenspace exposure levels in meta-analysis.","Mitigation":"Establish standardized classification criteria for 'high' and 'low' greenspace exposure to ensure consistency across studies.","Technologies":"Meta-analysis software with standardized exposure classification algorithms.","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and meta-analysts.","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical organizations, and public health research agencies."}]}
